Posts.Content: I am 34 years old very active lifestyle work out run leave life to the fullest about a year ago after having sex I had penile bleeding, which repeated itself on the second occasion there was quite a bit of blood, in addition I got insane balanitis looking something and my penic was burning everywhere. Long story short I was refereed to both urologist and dermatologist I have tried many creams prescribed by dermatologist of steroid and none steroid nature with no help, urologist give me course of cypro 500 for 20 days and bleeding had stopped, I had painful urination always painful ejaculation and my life turned upside down. Urologist I was seeing was not of much help and plainly told me I was too young for any issues he checked my rectum and advised it was absolutely normal to the touch. since I was not getting better I went to different urologist who also prescribed me to a second medication will provide the name later dont have on hands he also advised for me to undergo PSA test it came back 3.7 on 11 NOV 2015, he prescribed meds and advised to redo the test on 28 MAR 2016 and come see him, I attended yesterday and got terrible news that it is up to 4.4 now which got him very concerned, please note that he also performed colonoscopy and said it looked normal also checked me with ultrasound, in addition he conducted another rectum finger exam yesterday and advised that prostate is soft to a touch, he told me that this is super concerning but he is led to belive its not cancer once again he prescribed CYPRO 500 MG for 30 days and advised to redo PSA test and see him in June, I am super concerned any thoughts, my penis is currently red most of the time I have painful sex when I do have sex I wake up once a night to pee and sometimes its painful to pee.
Posts.Title: I am 34 years old with hi psa 4.4 please help with advise

Posts.Content: I couldn't have come to a better place I apologize for my initial post with many typos at the time I just came back from the docs and was I chaos, thanks so much gentlemen for your time and detailed advises and sympathy I will be visiting my urologist soon to adress the concerns I live in Toronto and this is my third urologist and all 3 were terrible so far first one was mr. buckler from north York gen, second one was dr. Jurigans from north York policlinic and current one is Nick Logarakis from Scarborough Gen hospital who takes only 2 minutes per appointment does t answer questions and rushes me through the door, I'd gladly pay to be properly assessed.
Posts.Title: I am 34 years old with hi psa 4.4 please help with advise
